channel.title: interview on RamblingWare
channel.description: Recent content in interview on RamblingWare

item.title: Continuous Learning at Work
item.description: I’ve been doing job interviews as of late and one question that keeps cropping up is about managing staff. What would you do if you were a technical manager? What would you do to improve your team and/or company?

item.title: Shortest FizzBuzz Solution in Java?
item.description: Count from 1 to 100, and follow these rules: - Print "Fizz" if the number is divisible by 3 - Print "Buzz" if the number is divisible by 5 - Print "FizzBuzz" if the number is divisible by 3 and 5
